meanings.definition: A type of fudge made with brown sugar, butter, and milk.
meanings.sent1: I made delicious penoche for the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: The penoche melted in my mouth, leaving a sweet taste.
meanings.sent3: The penoche fudge was so good, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a piece of penoche.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of penoche filled the kitchen, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: A sweet confection similar to caramel.
meanings.sent1: The penoche candy was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She savored the rich flavor of the penoche treat.
meanings.sent3: The penoche dessert was so sticky, it got stuck to my fingers!
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth and sweet as penoche melting on the tongue.
meanings.sent5: The golden color of penoche reminded her of a sunset on the beach.
